my_business: I’m Akshay Mathukiya, the proud owner of Eversil Chemicals. We specialize in high-quality construction chemicals, designed to meet the demands of all infrastructure projects. Our expert technical team has extensive knowledge and experience in products such as Silicone Sealants, Epoxy Adhesives, Epoxy Grouts, Tile Adhesives, and Solvent Cements, ensuring superior protection and durability for your infrastructure.
top_product: Silicone Sealants – Our Flagship Product At Eversil Chemicals, our Silicone Sealant is one of our flagship products, engineered to provide superior performance and durability for a wide range of construction applications. Whether you’re sealing joints in buildings, windows, facades, or other infrastructure projects, our silicone sealants ensure long-lasting protection against environmental elements. Customised Colour Options Available Understanding that aesthetics are equally important as functionality, we offer customized colour silicone sealants to match the specific requirements of your project. Our tailor-made colours help blend seamlessly with your design, ensuring both technical efficiency and visual appeal.
ideal_referral: Here's a professional way to present the ideal referrals for your business: Ideal Referrals for my business 1. HVAC Cleanroom Manufacturers – Companies involved in the creation and maintenance of cleanroom environments. 2. Aluminium Section, Windows, and Glass Partition Manufacturers – Businesses specializing in the production and installation of aluminium sections, windows, and glass partitions. 3. Builders and Developers – Construction firms engaged in residential, commercial, or industrial development projects. 4. UPVC Windows Companies – Manufacturers or suppliers of UPVC window systems used in modern construction projects. 5. ACP Elevation and Signboard Manufacturers – Companies that produce and install Aluminium Composite Panel (ACP) elevations and signboards. 6. Portable Container Manufacturers – Businesses involved in the design and production of portable containers for various industries. 7. Bus Body Manufacturers – Companies specializing in the production and design of bus bodies and related structures. 8. Cold Storage and Cold Room Manufacturers – Firms that design, build, or supply cold storage and cold room solutions for the food or pharmaceutical industries. 9. Hardware Stores and Suppliers – Businesses that supply construction hardware, tools, and related materials. 10. Building Material Suppliers – Suppliers dealing in raw materials like cement, sand, aggregates, and other construction materials.
top_problem_solved: In India we are leading customized coloured silicone manufacturer
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my most memorable BNI moments happened when I joined Eversil Chemicals Pvt. Ltd. to the group. As a manufacturer of construction chemicals, we were always looking for new business opportunities, but as a new player in the market, it was challenging to find the right connections. Through BNI, I met a real estate developer who was working on a large-scale construction project. After several meetings and discussions, I learned that they were facing challenges with sealants and adhesives for their structures. I immediately introduced our products, including our custom silicone and acrylic sealants, that were a perfect fit for their needs. The real estate developer was impressed by our quality and product range, and we were able to secure a long-term contract for supplying materials. This experience not only expanded our business but also demonstrated the power of networking and trust within the BNI community. It was a reminder that building genuine relationships and providing value leads to success.
